original_title: Oggi insieme domani anche - Storie d'amore e di separazione ai nostri tempi
overview: Portrait of love in our times through a mosaic of looks, faces, stories collected by numerous authors around Italy. The result is a multifaceted image, capable of representing the most elusive of feelings and making people reflect with lightness and irony.
title: Oggi insieme domani anche - Storie d'amore e di separazione ai nostri tempi
